      • buildRoadAt

        public void buildRoadAt(EdgeLocation edgeLocation)
        Build a road at certain edge
        Parameters:
        edgeLocation -
        Pre conditions:
        edge must not contains any piece and players must have enough resources or development card on their turn
        Post conditions:
        edge must have a road that belongs to player who built, player must lost resources or a development card

      • buildSettlementAt

        public void buildSettlementAt(VertexLocation vertexLocation)
        Build a Settlement at certain vertex
        Parameters:
        vertexLocation -
        Pre conditions:
        vertex must not contains any piece and players must have enough resources on their turn
        Post conditions:
        vertex must have a settlement that belongs to player who built, player must lost resources

      • upgradeSettlementAy

        public void upgradeSettlementAy(VertexLocation vertexLocation)
        Upgrade Settlement at certain vertex to City
        Parameters:
        vertexLocation -
        Pre conditions:
        vertex must contains a settlement that belongs to a player who triggered this function and players must have enough resources on their turn
        Post conditions:
        vertex must remove settlement and it has to have a city that belongs to player who built, player must lost resources

      • moveRobber

        public void moveRobber(HexLocation from,
                       HexLocation to)
        Move robber to certain Hex Tile
        Parameters:
        from -
        to -
        Pre conditions:
        Player must have used Knight/Soldier card or roll a dice and have 7 as a sum of two dice
        Post conditions:
        Robber must have moved to the other hex tile and player who triggered this function can steal a resource from one of other player who has settlement or city on that hex tile
